subject: Sales
title: The 30-Second Elevator Pitch
description: Learn The 30-Second Elevator Pitch in one minute.

hook.text: You step into an elevator with your dream investor. Doors close. Thirty seconds. Go.

buildup.text: The elevator pitch is the most compressed sales format: who you are, what you solve, why it matters.

discovery.text: The best follow a clear pattern: 'We help [audience] solve [problem] by [unique approach].'

twist.text: Most fail by cramming too much in. The goal isn't explaining everything but earning the next meeting.

climax.text: Practice until it sounds natural, not rehearsed. The best elevator pitches feel like conversations.

punchline.text: Thirty seconds to earn the next conversation. That's it.

quiz.question: What is the real goal of an elevator pitch?
options: Earn the next conversation or meeting
